p: For the purpose of coaxial spinning, a chitosan solution was prepared such that the final concentration was 3% w v −1, as described in our previous work [ 25]. Furthermore, 2.5% w v −1 aqueous dispersions were made from PEDOT:PSS pellets. The dispersions were then homogenized (Labtek IKAR T25) at 18,000 rpm for 15 min, followed by 1 h of bath sonication (Branson B5500R-DTH). Finally, polyethylene glycol (PEG) (10% w v −1) was added as-prepared dispersion directly and further homogenized at 18,000 rpm for 2 min, followed by 10 min bath sonication.
